name: Rogue Bots
storyline:
Play as a futuristic bot and use futuristic weapons and abilities to destroy other bots. 
Work with others to stop the bots and power up the facility again.
summary:
Rogue Bots is a sci-fi adventure in an abandoned facility created by a single developer. Play as a futuristic bot and use futuristic weapons and abilities to destroy other bots. 
 
Work with others to stop the bots and power up the facility again. Face waves of bots in survival mode. Get points for each bot destroyed and use them to upgrade weapons and unlock abilities.
